css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #row-maxi-fe779902-u{box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-light-color-8,150,176,203),1);max-width:1690px;min-width:initial;width:-moz-fit-content;width:fit-content;margin-right:0px;margin-left:0px;flex-wrap:nowrap;row-gap:20px;-moz-column-gap:0%;column-gap:0%;}@media only screen and (max-width:1920px){body.maxi-blocks--active #row-maxi-fe779902-u{max-width:1170px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:1366px){body.maxi-blocks--active #row-maxi-fe779902-u{max-width:90%;}}@media only screen and (max-width:1024px){body.maxi-blocks--active #row-maxi-fe779902-u{max-width:100%;}}@media only screen and (max-width:480px){body.maxi-blocks--active #row-maxi-fe779902-u{flex-wrap:wrap;row-gap:10px;-moz-column-gap:2.5%;column-gap:2.5%;}}
